Description

the class of ECS 179 is ruled by enemies, humans must coexist with these enemies in order to survive. As night falls, the enemies emerge from the dark corners of the classroom, seeking their next prey. But in this world, there exists a group of warriors known as the "Survivors”, individuals who possess the ability and courage to fight against the enemies, you are the one....

History

This project is started 2024.02.23, and finally completed 2024.03.23. It's a one month project.

Features

  • Roguelike RPG
  • Survivor
  • WIN/MAC/LINUX
